name: PlateShare
description: A food donation platform with roles like User, Charity, Restaurant, Admin, including Stripe integration, donation listings, and requests.
challenges: Integrating real-time requests and role-based access control was challenging.
improvements: Planning to add more analytics dashboards and enhance UI responsiveness.

name: Knowhive
description: Knowhive is a knowledge-sharing platform designed to connect learners and experts. It enables users to share articles and engage in meaningful discussions.
challenges: Handling content moderation and building a robust commenting system was tricky.
improvements: Future plans include adding real-time chat and improving search functionality.

name: Recipe Book
description: Recipe Book App is a dynamic and user-friendly platform for food enthusiasts to discover, save, and share delicious recipes.
challenges: Implementing efficient recipe search and filtering was a key challenge.
improvements: Planning to add meal planning and grocery list features.
